name: Do you think Jambi doesn’t have the greatest historical sites in Indonesia?
description:
I come to the roundway beside Batang hari  river, had been traveling far from the
crowded of activity people in the city come to the big complex of Hindu-budha
temples in Indnesia and they say its from past of site Sriwijaya kingdom and
Melayu kingdom. There’s so far from the city noise, polute noise and air in
Jambi city. The location temples complex in kecamatan Muara Sebo, Kabupaten
Muaro Jambi, Jambi Indonesia, beside batang hari river some 26 kilometers east jambi
city. I occasionally cross the settlements that are in side of the road, the
distance between the houses and the other one is not too close, besides the
houses there is also rubber trees plantation.
